content:
# Network health: all good! 3.41% monthly chain density.

![](https://ucarecdn.com/b2d8ccbe-5460-4c02-bb23-7a2425b9affb/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27947%27%20height=%27520%27/%3e)
![Network health: all good! 3.41% monthly chain density.](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2F7f24c22b-49a2-409f-9454-dc3dcbaca639%2F&w=1920&q=75)

Chain density is a reflection of the network health. With block coefficient 0.05 and slot duration 20s, ideal chain density would be about 5%. A chain density with a lower % implies the degree to which nodes are missing or failing to produce assigned blocks.

Cardano network health: <https://cexplorer.io/health>

## 2 contributors
